tool_description: Classifies feedback text into predefined topic categories using natural language processing techniques, providing confidence scores for each classification.

feedback_texts.description: Array of preprocessed feedback texts to classify

topic_categories.description: List of possible topic categories for classification

multi_label.description: Whether to allow multiple topic assignments per feedback

model_type.description: Classification model type: standard, advanced, or domain_specific

error_messages: Empty feedback array: Provide at least one feedback text to classify.
Invalid topic categories: Provide at least two topic categories for classification.
Invalid threshold: classification_threshold must be between 0.1 and 1.0.
Unsupported model type: Use standard, advanced, or domain_specific.
Classification failed: Unable to classify one or more feedback texts.
usage: Provide feedback_texts and topic_categories arrays. Configure classification_threshold, multi_label, and model_type as needed. Returns topic assignments with confidence scores.

topic_assignments.description: Primary topic assigned to each feedback

confidence_scores.description: Confidence score for each topic assignment

unclassified_count.description: Number of feedback texts that couldn't be classified
